long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EQ of AI (Exposure Quotient of AI) is a groundbreaking browser extension designed to protect users from inadvertently exposing sensitive information while interacting with AI systems. It operates in real time, scanning user inputs to identify and categorize hypersensitive data, such as financial details, personal identity information, and confidential content. By providing immediate alerts, the tool empowers users to make informed decisions before sharing data, offering options to either modify the input or proceed with caution. EQ of AI emphasizes data privacy and user control, reducing the risk of oversharing and enhancing awareness about the potential exposure of critical information. Its intuitive dashboard provides insights into user activity, highlighting improvements in risk management over time, making it an essential tool for safeguarding digital interactions.
